name: js-framework-benchmark-mikado
description: Web's smartest virtual DOM templating engine.
author: Nextapps GmbH

scripts.compile: node node_modules/mikado/task/compile ./../../src/template/app.html && node node_modules/mikado/task/compile ./../../src/template/item.html && echo Compile Complete. && exit 0
scripts.build: npm run compile && node task/build RELEASE=custom DEBUG=false USE_POLYFILL=false SUPPORT_CACHE=false SUPPORT_EVENTS=true SUPPORT_STORAGE=true SUPPORT_HELPERS=true SUPPORT_ASYNC=false SUPPORT_TRANSPORT=false SUPPORT_LOOP_INCLUDE=false SUPPORT_CONDITIONAL=false && exit 0
